briefdescription.para: Optional tools that are not part of the source.

detaileddescription.para: Optional tools that are not part of the source.

sect1.title: Parse Tree Visual
sect1.para: The syntax analyzer has the extra option to output the parse tree in .dot format

sect1.title: GRM files
sect1.para: The grammar files are for the most part reference only.They do not use any of the code generation features of the Gold Parsing Engine. They were initially written and tested with the tool-set.
I believe it is a dead project, but it is an awesome tool to quickly throw together and test grammars.
